sentences.english: As for dragon lanterns, there are many moving stories.
sentences.chinese: 说起龙灯，也有许多动人的传说。

sentences.english: County, Rong Guan camp hydrangea dragon is the way down from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 清苑县戎官营的绣球龙灯，就是这样代代相传下来。

sentences.english: There are dragon dances with drums.
sentences.chinese: 也会敲锣打鼓的舞龙灯。

sentences.english: To the pounding beat of the drums and cymbals, the dragon began to dance.
sentences.chinese: 锣鼓不住地响着，龙灯开始舞动了。

sentences.english: Uncle Ke-ting and his friends enjoyed themselves, and the dragon dancers got their money.
sentences.chinese: 五舅他们得到了满足，玩龙灯的人得到了赏钱。

sentences.english: It's the biggest dragon lantern I've ever seen in all my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是我这辈子见过的最大的龙灯。

sentences.english: Dragon also known as" Fire Dragon ", which is the most widely popular as a dragon dance.
sentences.chinese: 龙灯也称“火龙”，这是流行最为广泛的一种龙舞。

sentences.english: The Dragon Dance and Lion Dance are traditionally performed during the festival.
sentences.chinese: 耍龙灯和舞狮子是春节期间的传统项目。

sentences.english: When the Dragon Dance time is coming, people often ask actor to dance in their home.
sentences.chinese: 舞龙灯的季节，人们会请人到家里来舞一回。

sentences.english: Dance and Lion Dance are traditionally performed during the festival.
sentences.chinese: 耍龙灯和舞狮子是春节期间的传统项目。

definition: festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
dragon boat (used at 端午[Duan1 wu3], the Dragon Boat Festival)
waist drum/waist-drum dance (Han ethnic group folk dance)
the Lantern Festival (15th of first month of lunar calendar)
Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
